mapper.select: SELECT num, schedule, mc, stage, light, sound, staff, people, startday, endday, place, member_id "id", event_name "name", event_sum "eventSum", option_sum "optionSum" FROM event_plan WHERE num = #{num}

SELECT num, schedule, mc, stage, light, sound, staff, people, startday, endday, place, member_id "id", event_name "name", event_sum "eventSum", option_sum "optionSum" from event_plan WHERE member_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event_plan (num, schedule, mc, stage, light, sound, staff, people, startday, endday, place, member_id, event_name, event_sum, option_sum) VALUES (plan_num_seq.nextval, #{schedule}, #{mc}, #{stage}, #{light}, #{sound}, #{staff}, #{people}, #{startday}, #{endday}, #{place}, #{id}, #{name}, #{eventSum}, #{optionSum})
